thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of transferwise.com | 26 of 1820
thread.title: Viacheslav

author: Viacheslav
title: Viacheslav
text:
Subj. For a while it is my choice for transfer money to Ukraine from Europe. Quite clear functionality, transparent fees, responsive support. Some noticed issues:
- not clear state of bounced out transfers (reported to support)
- not instant transfer (about 1-2 work days). May be due UA specific. But in my case it is OK.
- not always clear description of different terms.
But in general â€” 4 of 5.
